name: An Interesting Journey of Monsieur PAF
name_original: An Interesting Journey of Monsieur PAF
description:
Trapped in an ancient temple during an archeological research, Monsieur PAF has to find a way out by solving the puzzles from a forgotten civilization.

USE YOUR 3D BRAIN IN A BEAUTIFUL 2D WORLD

An Interesting Journey of Monsieur PAF is an isometric puzzle-platformer. Sharing some mechanics with Sokoban, Monsieur PAF is twisting the genre by using 3D verticality in a beautiful hand-crafted 2D world.
